front.title: •Our Only Hope
front.gametext: USED: If your Rebel of ability > 2 just won a battle or duel, randomly take into hand one card stacked on Insignificant Rebellion. (Immune to Sense.)  LOST: If Luke is in battle (except with Vader), subtract 2 from each of opponent's battle destiny draws.
front.lore: 'The Emperor knew, as I did, if Anakin were to have any offspring, they would be a threat to him.'
